grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 悦に入る【エツニイル】to be pleased, to gloat, to glow with self-satisfaction
満悦【マンエツ】great delight, rapture
kun reading compounds: 喜ぶ【よろこぶ】to be delighted, to be glad, to be pleased, to congratulate, to gratefully accept
喜ばす【よろこばす】to delight, to give pleasure
